titles.title: Great Lakes Assurance Program Verification Act of 2013
Great Lakes Assurance Program Verification Act of 2013
To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a Great Lakes basin initiative for agricultural nonpoint source pollution prevention.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Energy, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Great Lakes Assurance Program Verification Act of 2013 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to require the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA), in consultation with the Great Lakes States, to establish a Great Lakes basin initiative for agricultural non-point source pollution prevention.
Gives funding priority to producers that participate in a state verification program.
Defines "Great Lakes State" as Illinois, Indiana, Michigan, Minnesota, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, or Wisconsin.
